title: Poll Results
author: JGray
text:
You just know Chrys was using her little girl voice for that panel. The one with just a hint of lip tremble.

So, here are the poll results!

Mandrake: 10

Chrys and Theresa: 9

Surgeon and Blue: 5

Chrys: 3

William: 3

Melody: 2

Kludge: 2

Circe: 2

Someone Else: 2

Theresa: 0

Wow, folks! What's wrong with Theresa that you don't want her to have a solo story?

I'll be announcing what stories we will be featuring in chapter 7 next week, first on the Patreon and then here.

See you next Monday!

replies.author: crowbar*Guest*
replies.text: I don't think it's that readers don't want a story with Theresa; it's that you just finished a Theresa & Chrys chapter, and some readers probably want a story with some of the character(s) we haven't seen in a while.

replies.author: fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: Theresa is best as the-person-things-get-explained to.All the rest of the cast pretty much know what's going on - Theresa is the cute newbie.Now, a solo-Theresa-in-the-Devil story, maybe.===============If i were Chrys' mom right now, i'd be torn between grounding her until she's twenty-five and telling her how proud of her i was.Or, perhaps, both.  Consecutively.

replies.author: Sario*Guest*
replies.text: It's not that I don't want a solo Theresa story, it's that I want a Blue and Surgeon story more right now.

replies.author: NoRAd*Guest*
replies.text: At first I thought William had his hand on Theresa's butt.
